nodes.text: The Return of the Jedi (French: Le retour du Jedi) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. The Return of the Jedi was written by Catherine Kalengula and published by Hachette Jeunesse on November 8, 2017.

A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away.…
Luke is determined to defeat the Empire once and for all. But to destroy the new Death Star, the young Jedi will need the help of his friend Han Solo, prisoner of the terrible Jabba the Hutt…
